dartlang.org
 intlx

Intlx is a pub package for dart, with internationalization APIs beyond what is provided in the intl package. To get started, try the demo below, read the docs, and install by adding intlx: any to your dependencies.

Languages# 

// Duration formatting

var durationFormat = new DurationFormat();
var duration = new Duration(
: ); 
durationFormat.format(duration)

// "Age" formatting

var ageFormat = new AgeFormat(
  rounder: new DurationRounder.staticUnit(
    TimeUnit.SECOND));
<link rel="import" href="package:intlx/age.html">

          

          

        

        

          

          

          

        

      

      

      

        

        

          
// Iterable formatting


          

          

        

        

          
var iterableFormat = new IterableFormat();

          

          

        

        

          
iterableFormat.format([])

          

          

        

        

          
iterableFormat.format([1])

          

          

        

        

          
iterableFormat.format([1, 2])

          

          

        

        

          
iterableFormat.format([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])

          

          

        

        

          

// Plural formatting (demo english only for now)


          

          

        

        

          
var pluralFormat = new PluralFormat({
  "0": "no books", 
  "one": "{0} book", 
  "other": "{0} books"}, pattern: "{0}");

          

          

        

        

          
pluralFormat.format(0)

          

          

        

        

          
pluralFormat.format(1)

          

          

        

        

          
pluralFormat.format(2)
